# API Surface: sync

*Auto-generated by Intelligent Analyzer*

| Name | Type | Description | Location |
|------|------|-------------|----------|
| SyncCoordinator | class | High-level coordinator integrating FormatPreservationSyncService with living docs workflow, handles GitHub issue creation/closure for user stories | sync-coordinator.ts |
| GitHubReconciler | class | Reconciles GitHub issue states with increment metadata statuses, fixes drift by closing/reopening issues | github-reconciler.ts |
| JiraReconciler | class | Reconciles JIRA issue states with increment metadata, handles status transitions via JIRA REST API | jira-reconciler.ts |
| LivingDocsUpdater | class | Applies pulled external changes to living documentation, updates YAML frontmatter with sync metadata | living-docs-updater.ts |
| FrontmatterUpdater | class | Updates user story YAML frontmatter with GitHub issue info for Layer 1 idempotency checks | frontmatter-updater.ts |
| GitHubSyncWrapper | class | Permission-enforced wrapper for GitHub operations using SyncInterceptor pattern | github-sync-wrapper.ts |
| JiraSyncWrapper | class | Permission-enforced wrapper for JIRA operations using SyncInterceptor pattern | jira-sync-wrapper.ts |
| AdoSyncWrapper | class | Permission-enforced wrapper for Azure DevOps operations using SyncInterceptor pattern | ado-sync-wrapper.ts |
| loadSyncMetadata/updateSyncMetadata | function | Platform-agnostic sync metadata persistence for tracking last import timestamps | sync-metadata.ts |
